item.title: Using the Apple Mac Mini 2018 as VMware ESXi homelab host
item.description: Begin November Apple released there new Apple Mini 2018 models. The last Mac Mini was from 2014. My first question: Is it possible to use the new Mac Mini 2018 as VMware ESXi host? So Iâ€™ve borrowed a Mac Mini 2018 model with the following specifications: Mac Mini 2018, CPU: Intel Core i3 3.
